026package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.operators;
027
028import com.ibm.streams.operator.AbstractOperator;
029import com.ibm.streams.operator.OperatorContext;
030import com.ibm.streams.operator.OperatorContext.ContextCheck;
031import com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamingData.Punctuation;
032import com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamingInput;
033import com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple;
034import com.ibm.streams.operator.compile.OperatorContextChecker;
035import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.InputPortSet;
036import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.OutputPortSet;
037import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.PrimitiveOperator;
038
039/**
040 * Simple sample operator that passes all input unchanged from
041 * any input port to its single output port. All input ports
042 * and the output port must have the same schema.
043 */
044@PrimitiveOperator(description="Simple sample operator that passes all input unchanged from any input port to its output port.",
045        comment=PassThrough.IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT)
046@InputPortSet
047@OutputPortSet(cardinality=1)
048public class PassThrough extends AbstractOperator {
049    
050    /**
051     * Verify the output port schema matches all input ports.
052     */
053    @ContextCheck
054    public static void matchingPorts(OperatorContextChecker checker) {
055        final OperatorContext context = checker.getOperatorContext();
056        for (StreamingInput<?> input : context.getStreamingInputs())
057            checker.checkMatchingSchemas(
058                input,
059                context.getStreamingOutputs().get(0));
060    }
061    
062    /**
063     * Forward the input tuple directly to output port 0.
064     */
065    @Override
066    public void process(StreamingInput<Tuple> stream, Tuple tuple)
067            throws Exception {
068        getOutput(0).submit(tuple);
069    }
070    
071    /**
072     * Forward the punctuation mark directly to output port 0.
073     */
074    @Override
075    public void processPunctuation(StreamingInput<Tuple> stream,
076            Punctuation mark) throws Exception {
077        getOutput(0).punctuate(mark);
078    }
079}
